item.title: Speaker Series (Spring 2021)
item.description: Here is a summary and schedule of the YuQC Speaker Series. Information & Recordings Check out this Youtube playlist of all past talk recordings!! Please click here (yale.edu account required) to access zoom links, meeting passwords, and, eventually, recordings for this speaker series. Prof. Michel Devoret Error correction of logical quantum bits March 26, Time TBA Currently the F. W. Beinecke Professor of Applied Physics at Yale University (which he joined in 2002), Prof.
